resources.string: The US dollar exchance rate will be transferrd only once a day
The US dollar exchange rate is read only once a day to minimze data.

EU customs duty are calculated according www.zolltarifnummern.de/zollgebuehren.php. 10%% cars, 4.5%% for big parts, 3.x%% small parts. Import tax is 19% in Germany. Images from unsplash.com, pixabay.com: \n Vitaly, Evan Dennis, Jeff Cooper, Jeff Sheldon, Jon Flobrant, Philip Swinburn, Jonathan Petersson Patrick Tomasso, Yaoqi Lai, Bhavyesh Acharya, Maria Molinero
Calculates US units to SI units. No warrenty.

No personally identifiable information is stored on your device or sent back regarding your use of the application. Only the last access time to the currency data set of the European Central Bank (ECB www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/policy_and_exchange_rates/euro_reference_exchange_rates/html/index.en.html) is stored on the device, you can switch off daily internet access in application settings. Its highly probable that the ECB is using the internet traffic data for their own purposes.
